extendedInfo.description: League of Legends Tournament Coverage for North America, Europe and Korea.Application developed in partnership with Leaguepedia.comIncludes - Standings & Brackets- Match Schedules and Results- Game Details (Picks, Bans, KDAs, CS, Summoner Spells and Items) for ALMOST every game- In-depth Team, Player and Champion statistics (PRO version only)

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Does just what it needs to. So much easier to keep track of the leagues.
reviews.author: Victor Luiga

reviews.title: Its perfect for what it does.
reviews.comment: It does what it says and it runs well.
reviews.author: Gregory van Meel

reviews.title: Great app but...
reviews.comment: Love the information provided all in one place but some of the times are wrong... Most of the ogn games say they start at 8am edt (my time zone) when they start at 6am. I had to double check the Leaguepedia site to double check
reviews.author: Brandt Bowling

reviews.title: One giant ad
reviews.comment: The app does nothing but advertise upgrading to pro. Without paying the app doesn\'t give you any information or updates, just tells you to upgrade to pro.
reviews.author: Geoff Sva

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: But it need a little bit of tweaks. On the tsm page, it says Dyrus is the mid laner and that regi is solo. Change this (not a big deal but still). Also, more player info would be grest, like a picture and maybe how old they are. Also, be able to go to a player and see all matches they have played, so that you can see all their build on one page. Would be a neat feature!  One last thing, a link to a VOD should be available on all game pages. Would be gold worth if you miss one game, Also antispoilers please!
reviews.author: Dogge Kvicksilver

reviews.title: Really, really good
reviews.comment: Definitely worth the upgrade for \302\2431.50
reviews.author: David Mynors

reviews.title: No, just no.
reviews.comment: Data aren\'t fresh. Even a day after matches, while on site are updated. No move to sd. Seriously? SERIOUSLY?
reviews.author: Jimbo Giannakopoulos

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Issues fixed!
reviews.author: Wojtek Iwan

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Best way to keep updated with Lcs
reviews.author: Marc Dwyer

reviews.comment: Easy to use, frequently updated - well worth the money.
reviews.author: Daniel Reid

reviews.title: Update ruined it...
reviews.comment: I updated it and now NA is only up to wk 6, does not even show that it goes to wk 9 and it will not even load the EU LCS... Plz fix...
reviews.author: Jacob Wilcynski

reviews.title: Says up to date
reviews.comment: It says the app is up to date, but it only shows up to week 6. If you are able to help me resolve this I\'d be more than happy to give the five stars. Its a great app but I\'m having issues :/
reviews.author: Notorious Nag

reviews.title: Bad update
reviews.comment: Latest update only shows up to week 6 for NA and EU nothing will load
reviews.author: Jake Hawkinson

reviews.title: Solid ap
reviews.comment: My only complaint is that I would like more diverse player stats. Let me see each player\'s total kills, deaths, cs, etc. The information can be discerned by what they give you, but having it compiled by the ap and listed would be nicer.
reviews.author: Norm Rothwell

reviews.title: Great app for lcs fans
reviews.comment: I\'m an avid lcs fan and gold league lol player.  This app is great for keeping up with standings and stats.  I highly recommend the pro version for in-depth builds and statistics.  Amazing app totally worth it!!
reviews.author: Brendan Wright

reviews.title: Cool and useful
reviews.comment: I love this app for if I miss LCS matches (usually Europe) and for the wealth of stats. A button to click to download all data would be cool, it\'s annoying to wait for it to load every time you switch leagues. Also the ability to compare stats of multiple leagues would be really awesome, but might require a big overhaul. I dunno.
reviews.author: Curt Blakeslee

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s awesome for knowing what time the games are
reviews.author: Nihaal Pabba

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Even the free version is great for keeping up to date
reviews.author: brad marston

reviews.title: Great for eSports fans
reviews.comment: I bought this app to keep up with LCS matches and stats while I\'m away from the computer, and it works great. It updates quickly, I can view details about the matches and teams, and it looks great.
reviews.author: Ryan Gallaway

reviews.title: Great App, but big problem on Pro version.
reviews.comment: When you click on All Player Statistics the app crashes other then that maybe only spoiler featured would make this better as it is fantastic.
reviews.author: Abdulla Al Abdulrazzaq
